amendment.description: An amendment numbered 42 printed in Part B of House Report 118-551 to eliminate any offices of Diversity, Equity, and Inclusion within the Armed Forces and Department of Defense along with the personnel in said offices.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Norman amendment (A018) Agreed to by recorded vote: 211 - 208 (Roll no. 267).

action.text: Pursuant to clause 6(h) of rule XVIII, the votes of the Delegates and Resident Commissioner were decisive on the previous vote and a separate vote in the House was required.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Norman amendment (A018) Failed by recorded vote: 212 - 212 (Roll no. 266).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Norman amendment (A018) Failed by recorded vote: 212 - 212 (Roll no. 266).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Norman amendment (A018) Agreed to by recorded vote: 211 - 208 (Roll no. 267).
